mapper.select: select sp.ID , NAME, CODE, URL_PATH, PID, TYPE, ICON_PATH, SORT from sys_permission sp INNER JOIN sys_role_permission sra ON sp.id = sra.PERM_ID INNER JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.role_id = sra.role_id WHERE sp.STATUS = 1 AND sur.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY sp.SORT,sp.CREATE_TIME desc

select sp.ID , sp.NAME, sp.CODE, sp.URL_PATH, sp.PID, sp.TYPE, sp.ICON_PATH, sp.SORT, p.`name` pidName from sys_permission sp INNER JOIN sys_role_permission srp ON sp.id = srp.PERM_ID INNER JOIN sys_user_role sur ON sur.role_id = srp.role_id LEFT join sys_permission p ON sp.pid = p.id WHERE sp.STATUS = 1 AND sur.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY sp.SORT,sp.CREATE_TIME desc
